members.signatureBeforeChange: int callWindowProc (int hwnd, int msg, int wParam, int lParam, boolean forceSelect)
members.signatureAfterChange: int callWindowProc (int hwnd, int msg, int wParam, int lParam, boolean forceSelect)
diff: -	boolean checkSelection = false, checkFilter = false, checkActivate = false;
-		* Bug in Windows.  For some reason, when the user clicks
-		* on this control, the Windows hook WH_MSGFILTER is sent
-		* despite the fact that an input event from a dialog box,
-		* message box, menu, or scroll bar did not seem to occur.
-		* The fix is to ignore the hook.

members.signatureBeforeChange: int callWindowProc (int hwnd, int msg, int wParam, int lParam)
members.signatureAfterChange: int callWindowProc (int hwnd, int msg, int wParam, int lParam)
diff: -		* Bug in Windows.  For some reason, when the user clicks
-		* on this control, the Windows hook WH_MSGFILTER is sent
-		* despite the fact that an input event from a dialog box,
-		* message box, menu, or scroll bar did not seem to occur.
-		* The fix is to ignore the hook.
-			int code = OS.CallWindowProc (TreeProc, hwnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
